arts.ttl: Swansea vs. Man City: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Manchester City’s Carabao Cup journey continues on the road in the fourth round, as they visit Swansea City on Wednesday night. Pep Guardiola’s side, meanwhile, cruised to a 2–0 win at Huddersfield Town to set up this tie, but they did have their nine-game unbeaten run snapped at the weekend, as they lost again at Villa Park.

arts.ttl: Man City Predicted Lineup vs. Swansea: Haaland Given Breather in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: They’ve been dealt two kind draws to start their journey, and Guardiola will feel assured enough to rotate his starting XI for Wednesday night’s fourth-round clash at Swansea City, despite succumbing to another defeat at Aston Villa on Sunday. CB: Rúben Dias —John Stones will earn some midweek respite after earning back-to-back starts, but Dias is poised to continue at the heart of Guardiola’s defence, given the lack of right-sided alternatives.

arts.ttl: Guardiola issues Haaland, Rodri, Khusanov, Ait-Nouri injury update before Swansea trip
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola provides the latest update on the fitness of his Manchester City squad ahead of Wednesday night’s EFL Cup fourth-round clash with Swansea City.

Swansea come into the tie on the back of their first win in nearly a month, a 2-1 victory over Norwich that lifted them to 13th in the Championship, and they will take confidence from a strong EFL Cup...
